name: my game for WGJ 239
description:
Press or click highlighted buttons to get higher score.

The cart will slow down ,stop and go down but it might take few seconds depending on the score.

The score will show after the cart will stops and starts to go down.

this is my first game jam game.

created for weekly game jam 239
